body_html:
Perhaps I was too succinct. I think this is more of a bug: a norm (mathematically speaking) always returns a number that is either zero or positive. A real number in any case, certainly never having an imaginary component.
I would expect tf.norm to cast the returned tensor to a float.

body:
Perhaps I was too succinct. I think this is more of a bug: a norm (mathematically speaking) always returns a number that is either zero or positive. A real number in any case, certainly never having an imaginary component.
I would expect `tf.norm` to cast the returned tensor to a float.
